section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:(The Last Hour would not come) until the habitations of Medina would extend to Ihab or Yahab. Zubair said: I said to Suhail how far these were from Medina. He said: So and so miles
